title: PromoTout
author: PromoTout
content: Hey everyone. I recently started a new site that posts gambling and sportsbetting guides, articles & promotions. Would you mind taking a quick look and letting me know what you think so far?We’re at promotout.com If you have any other ideas for how we can grow please let me know!

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Well, basically I see that the links in the promotion category contain referral offers, the site itself, it seems to me, requires better content than just posting four articles, it's good of course that there is a help section for addicts, in which one could place, for example, such a resource of free help for gambling addicts as https://quitgamble.com / from the topic on the forum Bitcoin gambling problem

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: as Daltonik has said, you need to better content and expand your content. as for what kind of content it is, it is up to you, there is a lot of good gambling content you can find on the internet that is worth reading. also, you should also add to the category your "exclusive promotions".

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: try also adding a review under the article you wrote about the casino that you wrote, maybe it will look even more interesting, but I can only give my opinion, it all comes back to you, of course I will be happy to support this because it will help beginners to play gamble well

comments.author: passwordnow
comments.body: Is this going to be another affiliate website where you'll eventually add your referral links? Well, your website is quite simple but too much simplicity to the point that it's not attractive anymore.Try to pick those tips that have been mentioned to you if you're still interested in making your site better. You're still starting out and it will be your hardest battle because beginning's are always the hardest part.

comments.author: PromoTout
comments.body: Thank you to everyone who posted a productive reply. Here’s what I’ve heard so far.Content needs to be more in depthWebsite is too simplistic, needs more visual elements.Integrate articles such that they link out to other articlesI will attempt to implement some of these ideas in the coming weeks. Please keep the suggestions coming!

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Welcome to Bitcointalk forum and hope you will enjoy the time you spend on this forum. Anyway, OP, I am quite confused at first which it made me think that your website is a gambling sites like a casino after reading a part of the title before I was able to read all of it. TLDR; I checked the website and base on the title of each one of it is good like the Top 7 Sports Betting Mistakes and I definitely agree with this one "Chasing loses". I think that most of the gamblers didn't even manage to complete that which is to recover all the loses. Well, I think some people may have done it or did it after winning very very huge amount. I am sure if you research then you will surely find that there are people who won huge amount and maybe that amount may have recovered all of the loses. Who knows if that person is tracking his/her funds and how much money is gambled and how much money won.

comments.author: Accardo
comments.body: The site is responsive, and fast, two things that makes a site worth revisiting, but I found two pages missing on your website, the about us and contact us page. These are crucial pages a website should have regardless of the stage, so far it's been launched. The background color is excellent for the kind of articles you publish. Don't think your site is too young not to be reached out to by people or clienteles. That's why you should always tell people your aim, why the website is launched then drop a contact detail that'll lead people easily to you. If it's somewhere on the site, hidden, that I didn't notice it please let me know or better make visible for visitors to easily see them.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: I am satisfied with content, short and concise. Be consistent in posting and results would follow. Consistency automatically brings improvements needed.

comments.author: TheGreatPython
comments.body: Quote from: PromoTout on February 18, 2023, 03:42:58 AMHey everyone. I recently started a new site that posts gambling and sportsbetting guides, articles & promotions. Would you mind taking a quick look and letting me know what you think so far?We’re at promotout.com If you have any other ideas for how we can grow please let me know!Start collecting feedback, testing websites/casinos, do some research and write review articles, which should be in depth and honest reviews about any service that you write them about, in this particular instance, gambling. There are a lot of platforms that you can review. You can start reviewing from the most popular one, that might also provide you with more traffic.You can buy a domain and switch your blog later one once you start getting enough visits and when you realize that your website/blog is getting some organic views and visits.

Wordpress has been under attack for years now from hackers, just saying.I understand that you are still starting, so the content is just a couple. But as what they say, content is king, so that is the key to get more traffic in your website.You need more casino's to review and add them add to your website. Best of luck!

comments.author: crzy
comments.body: The site is very simple and easy to access, its good to see some updates especially with the security of the site. Its good to have a category as well so the readers can easily navigate the topic that they are interested. If you are going to talked about the specific site as well, better to be more honest about it and better if you experience the site on your own so you can give your honest review about the pros and the cons of the site.

comments.author: redsun114
comments.body: Quote from: PromoTout on February 18, 2023, 03:42:58 AMHey everyone. I recently started a new site that posts gambling and sportsbetting guides, articles & promotions. Would you mind taking a quick look and letting me know what you think so far?We’re at promotout.com If you have any other ideas for how we can grow please let me know!Your website requires content, a lot of it, in order to stand out. And you will need to do some research and writing (if you do that yourself, otherwise ask your writer to do it) about topics that are getting a lot of hype at the moment. There are many new casinos and games released recently and a lot releasing in near future. You can focus on them, and also, try a bit harder in promoting it.Writing techniques and content representation will determine the amount of revisits from unique visitors to your site. So focus on that by keeping it one of the primary objects of your articles and publications.

comments.author: ralle14
comments.body: Whenever you're posting a new article i'd suggest posting it here in the gambling section as well so in a way you'd get new users to check out your site.I also agree with the others that you need more content but it's understandable because your site is still new so there's no need to point that out again assuming you'll post consistently.The last suggestion I could give is probably having a specific page for the new players like a FAQs or guide page since not everyone knows sports betting.

comments.author: PromoTout
comments.body: Wow, I can’t say thank you enough to everyone who has posted suggestions or critiques. As I stated I will continue to implement your suggestions. I've already secured the site with a certificate and continued to produce content daily.Outside of what has already been suggested, does anyone have ideas for new articles we should post?
